articles.title: Worried about Coronavirus? Tell Trump to reverse cuts to critical US agencies
articles.description: Trump administration should immediately reverse cuts to critical federal agencies in order to protect public health worldwide.
articles.content: The Coronavirus has quickly moved from an epidemic to a global pandemic, with 13 confirmed cases in the United States already and more feared to be on the horizon. As we scramble to contain Coronavirus and similar diseases in the future, it will become clear … [+5425 chars]

articles.title: 70 more people diagnosed with coronavirus on quarantined cruise ship in Japan
articles.description: Seventy more people were diagnosed with coronavirus on the cruise ship quarantined in Japan,...
articles.content:
Seventy more people were diagnosed with coronavirus on the cruise ship quarantined in Japan, Reuters reported Sunday. 
The new cases bring the total number on the ship to 355, which is the most anywhere outside of China, where the virus originated, according… [+402 chars]
